page: ME60103: Machinery Fault Diagnostics And Signal Processing

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Machinery Fault Diagnostics and Signal ProcessingMaintenance Principles, FMECA, Basics of Machine Vibration, Signal Analysis, Computer aided data acquisition, Time Domain Signal Analysis, Frequency Domain Signal Analysis, Fault Detection Transducers and Monitoring, Vibration Monitoring, Field Balancing of Rotors, Condition Monitoring of Rotating Machines, Noise Monitoring, Wear and Debris Analysis, Thermography, Electric Motor Current Signature Analysis, Ultrasonics in Condition Monitoring, NDT Techniques in Condition Monitoring, Case studies.
page: ME60103: Machinery Fault Diagnostics And Signal Processing

title: Student Opinion
text: very interesting subject. No hard Maths involve. Easy just requires time.
page: ME60103: Machinery Fault Diagnostics And Signal Processing

title: How to Crack the Paper
text:
1. Take classes for core concepts
2. Watch NPTEL video of this course --> http://nptel.ac.in/courses/112105048/
3. Learn Basics of MatLab.
page: ME60103: Machinery Fault Diagnostics And Signal Processing
